patch:
diff --git a/package.json b/package.json
index 2eab0c6..1750f92 100644
--- a/package.json
+++ b/package.json
@@ -55,7 +55,7 @@
     "electron-window-state": "^5.0.3",
     "fs-extra": "^7.0.0",
     "fuzzysearch": "^1.0.3",
-    "glob": "^7.1.3",
+    "glob": "^10.3.12",
     "has-ansi": "^3.0.0",
     "highlight.js": "^10.4.1",
     "is-unc-path": "^1.0.0",
diff --git a/src/lib/frameworks/project.ts b/src/lib/frameworks/project.ts
index d971fa3..47544d9 100644
--- a/src/lib/frameworks/project.ts
+++ b/src/lib/frameworks/project.ts
@@ -1,4 +1,4 @@
-import * as Fs from 'fs'
+import * as Fs from 'fs/promises'
 import { v4 as uuid } from 'uuid'
 import { findIndex, fromPairs, omit } from 'lodash'
 import { ApplicationWindow } from '@main/application-window'
diff --git a/src/lib/frameworks/repository.ts b/src/lib/frameworks/repository.ts
index d5221af..0908870 100644
--- a/src/lib/frameworks/repository.ts
+++ b/src/lib/frameworks/repository.ts
@@ -1,6 +1,6 @@
 import * as Fs from 'fs'
 import * as Path from 'path'
-import { Glob } from 'glob'
+import * as glob from 'glob'
 import { dialog } from 'electron'
 import { v4 as uuid } from 'uuid'
 import { findIndex, omit } from 'lodash'
@@ -216,11 +216,12 @@ export class Repository extends ProjectEventEmitter implements IRepository {
      */
     public async scan (): Promise<Array<FrameworkOptions>> {
         this.scanning = true
-        const glob = new Glob('*', {
-            cwd: this.path,
-            dot: true,
-            sync: true
-        })
+        const files = glob.globSync('*', {
+                            cwd: this.path,
+                            dot: true
+                        }).filter((path: string) => Fs.existsSync(Path.join(this.path, path)))
+
+        
         return new Promise(async (resolve, reject) => {
             const frameworks: Array<FrameworkOptions | false> = await Promise.all(Frameworks.map(framework => {
                 return framework.spawnForDirectory({
